timeline.message:
improve course registration

improve user login
add course registration message option
improve translations and add new explantions in course creation dialog
also allow users to register for courses without startDate or endDate

use rest template interceptors for Bamboo and Bitbucket and prefer token based authentication if avilable

rename secret to token for Gitlab config to be more consistent
fix config issues with new authorization
use basic auth to create projects

move methods from bob cli to Artemis

WORK IN PROGRESS
get rid of bambooClient and bitbucketClient
fix Bamboo issue when recreating a build plan that has already existed
reduced network calls to Bamboo + code quality improvements + documentation
code improvements and edge case handling
start fixing test case mocking errors

further improvements of BambooService, fix test compile errors

still WORK IN PROGRESS
further improvements for BitbucketService and BambooService
use a different REST call for cloning a build plan
move test method into different class
use improved REST calls for deletion of build plans and projects
fix issue with automatically parsing build logs from bamboo
improve various Bamboo calls and mock tests
add additional tests and improve tests

Merge branch 'develop' into feature/continuous-integration-improvements

# Conflicts:
#	build.gradle
#	package.json
#	src/main/webapp/app/course/manage/course-update.component.html
#	src/main/webapp/app/course/manage/course-update.component.ts
#	src/main/webapp/app/home/home.component.html
#	src/main/webapp/app/home/home.component.ts
#	src/main/webapp/app/overview/course-registration-selector/course-registration-selector.component.ts
#	src/main/webapp/app/shared/layouts/profiles/profile-info.model.ts
#	src/main/webapp/app/shared/layouts/profiles/profile.service.ts
#	yarn.lock
improve tests and fix codacy warnings
fix test and improve error message
bamboo token is now mandatory and not optional any more
